code: var initialState=0;var changeTheNumber=function changeTheNumber(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"Increment":return state+1;case"Decrement":if(state>0)return state-1;break;case"Reset":return 0;default:return state;}};export default changeTheNumber;
